ygData.subject: My bad
ygData.msgSnippet: I wasn t paying attention yesterday when I hit return and copied all the days previous posts. On the Life Leech quest. The rock is not no drop. Anyone can get
ygData.messageBody:
I wasn't paying attention yesterday when I hit return and copied all the days previous posts.
On the Life Leech quest.
The rock is not no drop.
Anyone can get it etched in the Inn in Rathe.
I had our cleric waltz in and do it.
Also, if you are like a human and have bad faction with the necro, you can have a DE SK do the quest and get you the scroll.
I myself have done it twice to help out other SK's.
Anyway, keep up the questions and I'll chime in where applicable.
Please not too many 'well here is my gear list, what do I need to upgrade' ones however.
Anyone other then a scattered few cracking the PoS quests?
I have 4 reagents so far, 2/3 of one quest done.
Should hopefully get the amulet in the next week or so.
-Metreus
